originalText.text: I'm grateful for the day I met Christina Giorgio. She is a fantastic, fearless attorney and a wise life coach.  Christina is passionate, dedicated, and super responsive. I trust her completely. Christina always puts her clients' best interest first and does so with compassion, conviction, humor and integrity.  Five stars all the way! " so glad to have her in my life!

text.text: I'm grateful for the day I met Christina Giorgio. She is a fantastic, fearless attorney and a wise life coach.  Christina is passionate, dedicated, and super responsive. I trust her completely. Christina always puts her clients' best interest first and does so with compassion, conviction, humor and integrity.  Five stars all the way! " so glad to have her in my life!

originalText.text: Christina Giorgio is a true champion for women's rights.  I'm so grateful to have had her as my attorney to enforce my right to breastfeed my baby while waiting in the emergency room at Lincoln Hospital.  Christina took my case when other attorneys were not interested. She fought hard for me and achieved a fantastic outcome.  She was so supportive and always available to me. Christina deeply cares about her clients and loves her works.  If I could give her 10 stars, I would.  A huge thank you, Christina!

text.text: Christina Giorgio is a true champion for women's rights.  I'm so grateful to have had her as my attorney to enforce my right to breastfeed my baby while waiting in the emergency room at Lincoln Hospital.  Christina took my case when other attorneys were not interested. She fought hard for me and achieved a fantastic outcome.  She was so supportive and always available to me. Christina deeply cares about her clients and loves her works.  If I could give her 10 stars, I would.  A huge thank you, Christina!

originalText.text: It’s intimidating and nerve racking to go against your employer. A true David and Goliath situation. Christina has a polite aggressiveness which other attorneys should fear. She has taught me that the law is not black and white. It’s more fluid which makes things more complicated. She knows the law but navigates the system even better.  I truly appreciate your time and perseverance Christina.

text.text: It’s intimidating and nerve racking to go against your employer. A true David and Goliath situation. Christina has a polite aggressiveness which other attorneys should fear. She has taught me that the law is not black and white. It’s more fluid which makes things more complicated. She knows the law but navigates the system even better.  I truly appreciate your time and perseverance Christina.

originalText.text: Christina Giorgio represented me and others in the South Bronx in our fight to stop yet another polluting industry coming into our neighborhood and worsening our already catastrophic asthma levels, among other environmental and health harms.  She did an amazing job.  Christina is a true fighter for social justice and I was blown away watching her present us in court, before the press and in the community.

She did an amazing job.  Christina is a true fighter for social justice and I was blown away watching her present us in court, before the press and in the community.

originalText.text: I am very happy to have chosen Christina Giorgio as my lawyer. She made me feel protected every step of the way and for me that was important because speaking out on what I went through was not an easy thing to do. She explains everything thoroughly. I could not emphasize enough how awesome she is! She is truly the best!
